table_formatting.bullets: Format the parameters and their descriptions as a table. The table will be in the form of a tabbed rows. The description for each param will be on a new line and indented
table_formatting.pipes: Format the parameters only as a markdown table using the instructions: To add a table, use three or more hyphens (---) to create each column header, and use pipes (|) to separate each column. For compatibility, you should also add a pipe on either end of the row

code_formatting.md_code_format: Surround single line python code with single backticks, and multiple lines of code with: ```python SAMPLE_CODE```

general.md_format_instruct: Respond using markdown style formatting. Use the # character for headers, with at least one space in between the header and the next text

api_explain.instruct: the description, parameters, attributes, 'returns', code examples Provide a minimum of 3 examples, increasing in complexity, using various parameters
api_explain.prompt_preface_true: For the following documentation, summarize if provided

code_help.instruct: Provide at least 2 examples, and provide one coding joke
